name: The Wonder Years
description: '''The Wonder Years''' is an American [[Rock music|rock]] band from [[Lansdale, Pennsylvania]], formed in July 2005. The band currently consists of [[Dan Campbell (singer)|Dan "Soupy" Campbell]] (lead vocals), Casey Cavaliere (lead guitar, backing vocals), Matt Brasch (guitar, vocals), Josh Martin (bass, vocals), Nick Steinborn (keyboards, guitar, backing vocals) and Mike Kennedy (drums, percussion). They have released seven full-length albums, two EPs, and several splits/compilations. The group is currently signed to [[Hopeless Records]]. Their name originates from a paper that Campbell read that was written by one of his after-school educators titled "The Wonder Years."
